attributes.action: hold an inquiry into the deaths of horses and donkeys at Spindles Farm, Amersham
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the recent rescue of horses from Spindles Farm, near Amersham, Bucks, we are querying why over 30 horses had to die before action could be taken. We would like a full, independent, public, inquiry to be instigated to enable a full investigation to take place into what went wrong and why action was not taken earlier. We would like the inquiry to make recommendations as to how the process, or law, could be improved to ensure that this sort of unacceptable suffering never happens again.
